name_abbreviation: Martz v. Golden Gate National Senior Care, LLC

parties: Nancy D. MARTZ, Executrix of the Estate of Harry L. Otto, Deceased, Respondent v. GOLDEN GATE NATIONAL SENIOR CARE, LLC; GGNSC Altoona Hillview LP, d/b/a Golden Living Center-Hillview GP LLC; GGNSC Altoona Hillview GP LLC; GGNSC Holdings LLC; GGNSC Equity Holdings, LLC; GGNSC Administrative Services, LLC; GGNSC Clinical Services, LLC; Golden Gate Ancillary, LLC; Denise Curry, an individual, and Robert Etchells, NHA, Petitioners

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 17th day of November, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The Superior Court’s order is VACATED. This matter is REMANDED for proceedings consistent with the decision in Taylor v. Extendicare Health Facilities, Inc., 147 A.3d 490 (Pa. 2016).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:

Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
November 17, 2016
